hotels.title: Award-Winning Vanuatu Villa Luxury with All-Inclusive Dining & Roundtrip Transfers
hotels.description: Escape to a South Pacific island paradise, staying in boutique luxury at The Havannah Vanuatu. Surrounded by azure waters, colourful coral and palm-fringed sands, this five-star, absolute beachfront resort offers all the charm of a family-owned property alongside world-class luxuries. Located on Efate, the largest island in Vanuatu, this adults-only retreat sits opposite the breathtaking Port Havannah harbour, your launchpad for snorkelling, watersports and sailing adventures. Take the complimentary resort shuttle to Vanuatu's capital, Port Vila, and discover the national museum, Mele Cascades waterfall, Ekasup Cultural Village and more. It’s not hard to see why this resort has won so many awards - including Tripadvisor's prestigious Travellers' Choice 2020 Best of the Best honour, placing it among the top 1% of hotels worldwide and the top five in the South Pacific. With a collection of traditional thatched villas tucked away in tropical gardens or on the beachfront, gourmet all-inclusive à la carte dining showcasing fresh local produce and seafood, a blissful spa and a host of activities, from sunset cruising to PADI diving, this island oasis leaves you wanting for nothing.
